issue.title: Empty perimeter can be saved but keep previous surface
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In basket, when drawing and saving a perimeter, the total area is saved (good behaviour).

When entering again the perimeter definition, then choosing another perimeter type without drawing one agin and then closing (validating) the perimeter definition, there is no more perimeter visible BUT the area (and the object in JS I guess) is still there.

It should not be possible to save an "empty perimeter".
